snippet.title: VALZ ~ Rhythm RPG | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
🎼 Available on App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1073540961

City of Lagu, once known as the capital of harmony has now fallen into deep slumber of silence. Lost is the power of Garputala, the holy instrument that keeps sound pure and intact. The dark side of the sound took over, infecting instruments of music, silences them and turns them into monsters of discord. Monster that can be defeated by those of the purest harmony.

Visit www.klappanome.com to learn more.
